backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles, product catalog, orders, and Stripe-related checkout with access control.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML wrapper providing the root element and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theming, and global providers for cart, toasts, and layout.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state with add, update, remove, clear operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions and helper functions for cart items, totals, and quantity calculations.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with about text, quick links, social icons, and attribution section.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, nav links, search, category filters, cart icon, and mobile menu using router, filters, and cart state.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Wraps the app layout with Header, Footer, and a main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image, details, price, and an add‑to‑cart button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategories.ts: Fetches product categories from the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Mutation hook for creating an order through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrder.ts: Fetches a single order by ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches the full product list from the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom theme variables, dark mode, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the store’s story, offerings, and values.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item controls, totals, and empty‑cart handling.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page handling customer details, authentication, order creation, and payment initiation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact page showing email, phone, address, and support info.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order status, customer info, items, and payment status after checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view with image, description, price, stock, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Product listing page with search, category filtering, and hero banner.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentButton.tsx: Triggers Stripe checkout session creation and redirects for payment.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentFailurePage: Handles failed payments, updates order status, and offers retry navigation.
Admin‑only UI for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/payments/PaymentSuccessPage: Processes Stripe checkout success by verifying session status, updating order payment, clearing session data, and redirecting to the order page while showing a loading spinner.
frontend/src/payments/useCreateCheckoutS: Creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor and returns the session URL using a React Query mutation.
frontend/src/storefront/filtersStore.ts: Zustand store managing search text and selected product category with simple setter actions.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats a price in cents into a USD currency string using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product image filenames to generated asset URLs with a fallback image.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the e‑commerce site's purpose, architecture notes, features, and image requirements.
